proper noun.description: An autonomous republic of northwestern Russia; population 959,500 (est. 2009); capital, Syktyvkar.

noun.description: A member of an indigenous people of northern Russia, from an area west of the Urals.
The Finno-Ugric language of the Komi, with about 350,000 speakers.

adjective.description: Relating to the Komi or their language.
